keyword: how many calories are in a costco hot dog
title: How Many Calories Are in a Costco Hot Dog?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in a Costco hot dog, including the bun, plus protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and quick variations for your meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Costco Hot Dog?
assumptions: Quarter-pound all-beef hot dog with steamed bun; no condiments or additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by preparation, exact ingredients, and serving size. Check Costco's labels or app for the most current info.

quick_answer.text: A standard Costco hot dog with bun contains about 570 calories and 26 g protein.

basis.label: per 1 Costco hot dog with bun

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Costco hot dog without the bun?
faqs.a: About 390 calories for the hot dog alone.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in a Costco hot dog?
faqs.a: Approximately 26 g of protein per hot dog with bun.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Costco hot dog?
faqs.a: Around 1670 mg, mostly from the hot dog and bun.
No, the bun contains gluten; opt for no bun if avoiding it.

faqs.q: How do condiments affect calories in a Costco hot dog?
faqs.a: Basic condiments like ketchup and mustard add about 30 kcal; cheese or chili can add more.
